p: As age and laboratory optimal cut-off points were unknown, the effective (accurate and sensitive) cut-off values for discriminating HM and normal myelogram were tested a posteriori, using the Receiver Operating Characteristic curves (ROC) method. The area under the curve (AUC for c-static) was calculated with its corresponding Standard Error (SE), 95% CI, and P-value. The criterion for two-sided statistical significance was p-value <0.05. All analyses were performed using SPSS software version 23.0 for Windows (IBM/SPSS Inc., New York, USA).
